code: @Test public void testString() throws Exception {     testJson("\"A string\"", "A string"). }
@Test public void testMap() throws Exception {     testJson("{value=123}", Collections.singletonMap("value", 123.0)). }
@Test public void testList() throws Exception {     testJson("[{value=123}]", Collections.singletonList(Collections.singletonMap("value", 123.0))). }

private void testJson(String json, Object expected) throws Exception {     Object unmarshalled.     GsonDataFormat gsonDataFormat = new GsonDataFormat().     gsonDataFormat.doStart().     try (InputStream in = new ByteArrayInputStream(json.getBytes())) {         unmarshalled = gsonDataFormat.unmarshal(null, in).     }     assertEquals(expected, unmarshalled). }
